dishes.name: Sushi
dishes.description: A Japanese dish of prepared vinegared rice, accompanied by various ingredients such as seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.

dishes.name: Pizza Margherita
dishes.description: Classic Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

dishes.name: Tacos al Pastor
dishes.description: Traditional Mexican dish featuring marinated pork, typically served in corn tortillas with pineapple and cilantro.

dishes.name: Pad Thai
dishes.description: A popular Thai street food, stir-fried rice noodles served with tofu, peanuts, and bean sprouts.

dishes.name: Beef Bourguignon
dishes.description: French stew of beef braised in red wine, traditionally from the Burgundy region.

dishes.name: Falafel
dishes.description: Middle Eastern deep-fried balls made from ground chickpeas or fava beans.

dishes.name: Peking Duck
dishes.description: A famous dish from Beijing that features roasted duck served with thin pancakes, hoisin sauce, and spring onions.

dishes.name: Moussaka
dishes.description: A Greek dish made of layers of eggplant, potatoes, and minced meat, topped with béchamel sauce.

dishes.name: Ceviche
dishes.description: A seafood dish popular in the coastal regions of Latin America, typically made from fresh raw fish cured in citrus juices.

dishes.name: Borscht
dishes.description: A beet soup commonly found in Eastern Europe, often served with sour cream.

dishes.name: Ratatouille
dishes.description: A French Provençal stewed vegetable dish, originating in Nice, made of zucchini, eggplant, peppers, and tomatoes.

dishes.name: Paella
dishes.description: A Spanish rice dish originally from Valencia, traditionally made with seafood, chicken, and vegetables.

dishes.name: Kimchi
dishes.description: A traditional Korean side dish made from fermented vegetables, typically napa cabbage and Korean radish.

dishes.name: Pho
dishes.description: A Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, usually beef or chicken.

dishes.name: Shepherd's Pie
dishes.description: A British dish made of ground meat topped with mashed potatoes and baked until golden.

dishes.name: Pierogi
dishes.description: Dumplings of unleavened dough, stuffed with fillings like potatoes, cheese, and meat, popular in Eastern Europe.

dishes.name: Hummus
dishes.description: A creamy Middle Eastern dip made from blended chickpeas, tahini, olive oil, and lemon juice.

dishes.name: Bibimbap
dishes.description: A Korean dish of mixed rice with vegetables, beef, a fried egg, and chili paste.
